exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language language_dec : language_decideable nilTermsHelp := fun (n : nat) (H : n = 0) => nat_rec (fun n0 : nat => n0 = 0 -> Terms n0) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => Tnil) (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : n0 = 0 -> Terms n0) (H0 : S n0 = 0) => let H1 : False := eq_ind (S n0) (fun e : nat => match e with | 0 => False | S _ => True end) I 0 H0 in False_rec (Terms (S n0)) H1) n H : forall n : nat, n = 0 -> Terms n consTermsHelp := fun (n : nat) (H : Terms n) => match n with | 0 => forall p : 0 = n, {_ : unit | eq_rec 0 (fun z : nat => Terms z) Tnil n p = H} | S n0 => forall p : S n0 = n, {t : Term * Terms n0 | eq_rec (S n0) (fun z : nat => Terms z) (Tcons n0 (fst t) (snd t)) n p = H} end : forall n : nat, Terms n -> Set n : nat x : Terms (S n) The term "(var 0, x)" has type "(Term * Terms (S n))%type" while it is expected to have type "(Term * Terms n)%type".
